snippet.title: SQUIDS launch trailer
snippet.description:
For the latest info on SQUIDS, or to ask us a question, check us out on Twitter @SquidsTheGame or http://www.facebook.com/SquidsTheGame.

Build your team of Squid heroes for epic turn-based battles against corrupted crabs and shrimps!
Now available for iPhone and iPod touch: http://itunes.apple.com/app/squids/id467904350

"The adorable spawn of Angry Birds and Final Fantasy Tactics" -The Escapist 
"I was hooked from round one... SQUIDS is a really nice blend of iOS gaming and smarter tactical play" - Destructoid 

Features 
• Grab Squids by the tentacles, then fling them across the battlefield 
• Mixes the best of iOS gaming with classic RPG elements 
• Recruit a unique team of Squids in four different classes: shooters, scouts, troopers and healers 
• Use strategy and skill to win turn-based battles, use the environment to your advantage
• Customize your party with special ability-boosting helmets 
• Enjoy an epic story with giant turtle rides and heroic boss battles 
• Discover the Squids' legendary world through gorgeous detailed levels 
• Game Center and OpenFeint support for leaderboards and achievements
